list.Name: Timekeeper's Hourglass
list.Description: A mystical hourglass that controls the flow of time.

list.Name: Chrono Charm
list.Description: A magical charm that bends time to your advantage.

list.Name: Temporal Stopwatch
list.Description: A high-tech stopwatch capable of manipulating time.

list.Name: Infinity Timer
list.Description: A legendary timer that grants control over time itself.

list.Name: Searing Blade
list.Description: A fiery blade that deals extra damage while in idle.

list.Name: Infinity Gauntlet
list.Description: A powerful gauntlet that multiplies damage after a correct answer.

list.Name: Streak Booster
list.Description: A magical amulet that boosts the initial streak multiplier.

list.Name: Momentum Sword
list.Description: A swift sword that increases the streak multiplier with each correct answer.

list.Name: Guardian Shield
list.Description: A sturdy shield that increases the wrong answers limit.

list.Name: Armor of Resilience
list.Description: A legendary armor that grants extra protection after achieving a certain streak.

list.Name: Lucky Charm
list.Description: A mystical amulet that makes difficulties for free.

list.Name: Insanity Chestplate
list.Description: A powerful chestplate that greatly increases the drop rate of chests.

list.Name: Gold Booster
list.Description: An enchantment that boosts the default gold value by a certain percentage.
